name: VIRGINIA CREDIT UNION LEAGUE
sampleDescriptions: interchange corporate governance for credit unions serving the unbanked
interchange corporate governance for credit unions serving the unbanked

Lobbied and researched information relative to the NCUA budget; discussed in-person versus virtual meetings at credit unions. Lobbied against the Credit Card Competition Act of 2022 (S. 4674; H.R. 887
